div.head: 傷寒畜血
div.div: harm caused by cold with accumulated blood

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with accumulated blood

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a type of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, where evil heat enters the interior and clashes with the blood, with stagnant heat accumulating internally. Shang han lun 傷寒論 237: 陽明證，其人喜忘者，必有蓄血 , “In cases where a person [with harm caused by cold] shows yang brilliance signs and has a tendency to forget, this must be accumulated blood”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xi 犀 : ( 角）磨汁，治 吐血、衄血、下血，及傷寒畜血 , “The juice obtained by grinding the horn serves to cure blood spitting, nosebleed, discharge of blood, and harm caused by cold with accumulated blood ”.
